example.code:
PS C:\> Set-ELBHealthCheck -LoadBalancerName my-load-balancer ` >> -HealthCheck_HealthyThreshold 2 ` >> -HealthCheck_UnhealthyThreshold 2 ` >> -HealthCheck_Target "HTTP:80/ping" ` >> -HealthCheck_Interval 30 ` >> -HealthCheck_Timeout 3
HealthyThreshold : 2 Interval : 30 Target : HTTP:80/ping Timeout : 3 UnhealthyThreshold : 2
example.description: This example configures the health check settings for the specified load balancer.
